name: somatization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of experiencing problems that are psychological (= relating to the mind) in a physical way, for example as pain or tiredness: When I am unable to regulate my anxiety, it can result in somatization. In somatization disorder, the person complains of symptoms that cannot be objectively confirmed.
More examplesFewer examplesSomatization is pain in the body caused by an inability to express emotional pain in words.People in this group were considered to be at least at risk for somatization. The low rates of reported depression and the phenomenon of somatization in these people are likely to be influenced by cultural factors.
